About Us

Key Start is a corporate company that runs for a sole purpose of marketing of our valued partners. Our base of performance would be the target number of students that we would set per year. The premises of marketing would be all the potential target market the particular courses your institution has throughout the world.

Once we take a target from you, we will position your institution as the best one in those target markets through our own strategies of aggressive commercial and digital marketing. The team comprises of professionals from marketing background since last decade.

Our team has been proving the strength of its teamwork through past experiences with several educational institutions.
